pr_title: DHFPROD-4478: loadData artifact is now included in the downloaded zip

timeline.message: DHFPROD-4478: Including loadData artifact when downloading a project
DHFPROD-4478: Test to verify downloaded zip includes loadData

timeline.bodyText: @aebadirad @ryanjdew Do you know the reason why these folders aren't under "src/main" to begin with? If they were, we'd only need to grab "src/main" here.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: Also, the name "loadData" hurts my head, since it's a "verb + noun" and everything else is "nouns". Guess that ship has sailed though.
replies.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: artifacts != code, but that's why I designed it that way. Current trajectory seems to be more 'java' oriented, so it may make sense to change that in the future.
replies.author: aebadirad

timeline.bodyText: we had better use single class import. You can check your java code style configuration. Make sure the option "Use single class import" checked.
timeline.author: hao1st

replies.bodyText: I have single class import checked already:
replies.author: bsrikan
